title: [Large-scale] Scaffolding Strategies for Scientific Explanation of Socioscientific Issues (SSI)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary biochemistry knowledge and awareness of social science issues
context.additional_context: A training program for professional adult learners systematically analyzing social science issues connected to scientific frameworks

learning_goals: Learners can build explanatory frameworks connecting SSI cases to biochemical concepts
Learners can write analytical reports integrating scientific and socio-economic contexts of SSI
Learners can structure complex SSI issues in 3 stages (problem definition-evidence presentation-solutions) using scaffolding strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
